# Third-Party Libraries

Below are the third-party libraries used in this project along with their file links:

* [Vue](https://unpkg.com/vue@2.6.12/dist/vue.js)

* [Vue Router](https://unpkg.com/vue-router@3.0.0/dist/vue-router.js)

* [Sortable](https://github.com/SortableJS/Sortable/raw/1.8.4/Sortable.min.js)

* [Vue.Draggable](https://github.com/SortableJS/Vue.Draggable/raw/v2.20.0/dist/vuedraggable.umd.min.js)

* [vue3-sfc-loader](https://unpkg.com/vue3-sfc-loader@0.8.4/dist/vue2-sfc-loader.js)

* [Vuetify](https://github.com/vuetifyjs/vuetify/releases/download/v2.6.12/vuetify-v2.6.12.zip)

* [MaterialDesign-Webfont](https://registry.npmjs.org/@mdi/font/-/font-7.1.96.tgz)

* [Fontsource Roboto](https://registry.npmjs.org/@fontsource/roboto/-/roboto-5.0.8.tgz)

* [text-encoding](https://registry.npmjs.org/text-encoding/-/text-encoding-0.7.0.tgz)
